name: CometLeads Contact
author: CometLeads

sections.description:
CometLeads Contact – Conversational Lead Generation

Get low conversions with your site?
Have no idea of anything of your leads? ComletLeads feels your pain. CometLeads Contact is a product to rebuild your confidence of winning hearts of your leads.

CometLeads Contact for WordPress is a plugin to enpower your wordpress with our powerful conversational lead gen bot.

WHAT WE CAN HELP YOU

  • Generate more leads from your wordpress site
  • Get in-depth insights of your leads, and grow your audiences
  • Build your reputation

FEATURES

  • Collect lead information
  • Talk in natural human way
sections.installation:
1. Search “Cometleads” on your wordpress admin portal in the Plugin Menu
  2. Download and activate the plugin called ‘Cometleads Contact’
  3. Once you activated the plugin, you will notice a *Settings” link next to it
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Search “Cometleads” on your wordpress admin portal in the Plugin Menu
  2. Download and activate the plugin called ‘Cometleads Contact’
  3. Once you activated the plugin, you will notice a *Settings” link next to it

To uninstall, go to your plugin page, find ‘Cometleads Contact’. Click ‘deactivate’ and then ‘Delete’.

Is this free to use?

Yes. This wordpress plugin is free to use.

Does it support multi-site?

No, it doesn’t.
